text: William Gustavo Constâncio (born 9 January 1992), simply known as Gustavo, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a centre-back, most recently for Yerevan.Soccerway profile ==Career== Born in Limeira, Brazil, Gustavo signed for Académica, on 11 July 2015, on a two-year loan. On 25 June 2019, Lori FC announced the signing of Gustavo on a two-year contract. On 4 September 2019, FC Yerevan announced the signing of Gustavo on a one-year contract. On 21 February 2020, the Football Federation of Armenia announced that FC Yerevan had withdrawn from the league due to financial and technical problems. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Associação Académica de Coimbra – O.A.F. players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Estonia Category:Meistriliiga players Category:Nõmme Kalju FC players
title: William Gustavo
